item.title: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.1.10
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.1.10
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 23 May 2024 21:42:52 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Override library implementing ZMQ lazy pirate reliable request reply (RRR) protocal using RemoteControl SMO framework.

Release Notes: [1.1.1]
- Update install location
- Update default timeout for ZMQ read
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

- remove malleable VI Read Configuration.vim
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LEIDEN FP v4.57.3.3
item.description:
Product: LEIDEN FP v4.57.3.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 10 May 2024 10:12:11 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Tools used by LevyLab to interact with Leiden Front Panel (FP)
API:
Push Button (Start, 3He, 4He, Normal, Recovery, Auto, Reset, LED Test)
Set Mode (Auto Off, Start, Condense 3He, Condense 4He, Normal Circulation, Recovery)
Get Mode

Release Notes: second build
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.7.2.1
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.7.2.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 09 May 2024 12:18:59 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.7.1]
- Issue #114: remove OpenG Zip dependency
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl v1.1.2.6
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.1.2.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 24 Apr 2024 14:44:43 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.1.2]
- bug fixes to Test VIs
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
